title: Clubs getting fixed soon?
body: I'm a Club leader and STILL am not back in my club again. Any idea of how to fix this? I'm shown in the club still but I'm not in the club at all.

replies.body:
We've resolved most clubs issues, but for the remaining club owners experiencing these issues, we'll need a [support ticket](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) submitted. One of our specialists will be happy to assist you from here.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
